name: Sid Meier's Railroad Tycoon Deluxe
description:
Sid Meier's Railroad Tycoon Deluxe is a strategy game developed by MPS Labs. It was originally released in 1992. It was published by MicroProse. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Sid Meier's Railroad Tycoon Deluxe on PC.
It was scored by Jeffery L. Briggs.
